name: [Auto] Retreat on hull damage I
desc: Forces the ship to retreat when falling below %s%% hull integrity

name: [Auto] Retreat on hull damage II
desc: Forces the ship to retreat when falling below %s%% hull integrity

name: [Auto] Retreat on hull damage III
desc: Forces the ship to retreat when falling below %s%% hull integrity

name: [Auto] Retreat when no missile left
desc: Forces the ship to retreat when it does not have any missile left

name: [Auto] Retreat on degraded performance
desc: Forces the ship to retreat when it has exceeded its peak performance time

name: [Auto] Retreat on low performance
desc: Forces the ship to retreat when it has exceeded its peak performance time and it is below %s%% Combat Readiness

name: [Auto] Retreat on possible malfunction
desc: Forces the ship to retreat when it has exceeded its peak performance time and it is below %s%% Combat Readiness

name: [Auto] Retreat when idle
desc:
Forces the ship to retreat when it does not have any specific order to follow.

This will only happen after the first contact with the enemy fleet.
